settings.title: I placed an order, but I did not get an order confirmation, but the money was taken from my account
settings.content:
Most likely, you have entered an incorrect zip code in the billing section of your order. Which resulted in your payment getting declined.

The zip code needs to be the same zip code that your bank uses to send you the bank statements or the primary mailing address registered with your bank.

In this case, your bank has placed a 24-hour hold on the full amount of the order. and it should show as a Pending transaction.

No worries, it will be released by your bank the next business day.

If we have not sent you an email order confirmation, then we have not officially recieved your funds.

You can place a new order with the correct zip code, or you can wait till the next day for your bank to release the funds, and then once again place the order.

settings.title: Tracking stating package was delivered but has not arrived
settings.content:
Please allow 1-2 business days for the package to show up. And we have had an experience where the carrier would mark packages as delivered before delivering them so they would not consume time on the route.

After the waiting period, If the package still did not show up, please follow these instructions:

If you bought Route Package Protection with your order, click here.

Please click here to contact us if you have not bought any package protection. Most likely, we have our insurance that would cover it.

settings.title: Would like to Cancel or Edit an order that was just placed
settings.content:
We give our customers 3 hours or until the item ships after the order was placed to cancel or edit their order directly from their email confirmation, so please open your order confirmation email and scroll down to find the "Edit or Cancel Order" button.

Unfortunately, Any editing to an existing order will result in a cancelation, and the order must be placed again.

settings.title: Received an Email Action Needed: Order Placed on Hold
settings.content:
You are receiving this email because our fraud system has detected an unusual activity or behavior on your order.

Please follow the instructions in the email to resolve the issue.

Preview Email Here

settings.title: Order placed on the weekend, When will they ship?
settings.content:
Carriers do not operate on the weekend.

Any orders placed after 5 PM Friday to Sunday, Will not be picked up till Monday at 4:45 PM

We might create a label for the order during the weekend, and tracking
information will be emailed, but no movement will occur until the carrier picks
up on Monday.

settings.title: Item or package arrived damaged
settings.content:
Please follow these instructions:

1- If you bought Route Package Protection with your order, click here.

2- Please click here to contact us if you have not bought any package protection. Most likely, we have our insurance that would cover it.

settings.title: Coupon code can not be applied
settings.content: Some of our products are seasonal or already discounted so not all the items can have the coupon applied to.

settings.title: Incorrect Item received
settings.content: If we have shipped you the wrong item, we apologize for this in advance, and please click here to start returning the item you got, Choose "Incorrect item received (Upload Picture )" from the Why are you returning this item? List (Please scroll down the list to find that option).

settings.top_heading: I HAVE A PROBLEM WITH MY ORDER
